SELECT T1.companyCode ,T1.companyName ,T1.companyPhone ,T1.postCode ,T1.address1 ,T1.faxNumber ,T1.mobilePhone ,T1.email ,T1.email_cc ,T1.chargeName ,T1.createUserId ,T2.userName as createUserName ,T1.updateUserId ,T3.userName as updateUserName ,T1.createDateTime ,T1.updateDateTime ,T1.deletedYn FROM adCompany T1 Left Join ofUser T2 On T1.createUserId=T2.userId Left Join ofUser T3 On T1.updateUserId=T3.userId WHERE T1.deletedYn='N'
